BNC User Reference Guide

<labelGen>

labelGen specifies the label to be generated for the parent reference.
Declaration 
element labelGen { attribute change { "onStart" | "within" }?, text }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
change specifies when the new label is to be generated.
Status: Optional
Legal values are:
onStart a new label is generated when a new instance of the scope-defining element is found, and remains in force until the next such element is found.
within a new label is generated when a new instance of the scope-defining element is found, and remains in force until that instance ends.
Module module-from-bncxml
